About

Welcome to my little corner in the internet!

I'm currently a student at Purdue majoring in CS and minoring in math. When I'm not busy working on HW or binging YouTube videos, you can find me working on a project relating to my current interest. Currently it's probably related to deep learning or stock trading. Among those things, I'm passionate about open-source and educating people about things I'm interested in.

I want this website to be a one-stop place for people to checkout what I am doing. So if I'm doing this right, within a few years this place should be a cluster-dump of ideas.
